name: @contentful/mcp-server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for the Contentful Management API

tools.name: get_initial_context
tools.description: Initialize connection and get usage instructions

tools.name: archive_entry
tools.description: Archive entries that are no longer needed but should be preserved

tools.name: archive_asset
tools.description: Archive assets that are no longer needed but should be preserved

tools.description: Restore archived assets for editing and publishing

tools.name: list_editor_interfaces
